Description.first: Hello, my name is Jorge Jesús Campoy López and I am passionate about web development, since I was a child I always liked a lot, drawing, medicine, and computer science, although from a young age I have dedicated myself to hospitality to help my family, some time later and thanks to a friend I entered the world of programming and marveled at the possibilities it offers, I got down to work to discover all the things I can create

Descriptions._01: I've been a front-end developer specialized in Angular since 2018.
Descriptions._02: Lover of good practices and clean code, looking for a professional challenge that will make me grow even more.
Descriptions._03: I have developed both the layout and the logic and optimization of different applications.

FunctionsPerformed._02: Development of the logic of the functionalities.
FunctionsPerformed._06: Study of the requirements definition documents and communication with the client.
